address: Xã Đông Hoàng, Thành phố Thanh Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa
thought:
**The Ward Detective's Case: Tracking Down "Xã Đông Hoàng"**

Alright, let's dive into this address: "Xã Đông Hoàng, Thành phố Thanh Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa." My initial task is straightforward: pinpoint the new administrative unit for "Xã Đông Hoàng." First, "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" is the province; I know to check for any province-level changes. Resolution 60-NQ/TW tells me the province itself isn't being merged or renamed. Good. Next, "Xã Đông Hoàng" is the ward.

I'll consult the relevant provincial resolutions. Resolution 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15 seems promising, specifically its section on the rearrangement of sub-district units in Thanh Hóa. I'll read through this resolution to look for any mention of the ward, "Đông Hoàng." I scan the lines, meticulously checking each reorganization. I don't see anything regarding "Đông Hoàng" in the first several cases where wards were merged and renamed, but a few lines down, Bingo! Line 130 explicitly states that "Xã Đông Hoàng" is being incorporated into "phường Đông Sơn" along with other wards. This is critical.

To confirm this, I cross-reference this information with other sections within the resolution, namely line 146, which mentions which wards had no change. "Đông Hoàng" is not listed, so I know I'm on the right track.

Now, to solidify the conclusion, I search for the details on the new ward, "phường Đông Sơn." I have found its details in the 'New wards' section.

Therefore, "Xã Đông Hoàng" is now a part of "phường Đông Sơn," in the province "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa." I can confidently construct the output with a high degree of confidence, citing the resolution and line as support.

citation.header: 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Thanh Hóa
citation.line: 130. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các phường Rừng Thông, Đông Thịnh, Đông Tân và các xã Đông Hòa, Đông Minh, Đông Hoàng, Đông Khê, Đông Ninh thành phường mới có tên gọi là **phường Đông Sơn**.
